content: Ron LevieSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationRon Levie GeneralI am a Senior Lecturer (Assistant Professor) at the Faculty of Mathematics, Technion – Israel Institute of Technology.Until 2022 I was a postdoc researcher in the Mathematical Foundations of Artificial Intelligence Group, Mathematical Institute, Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich. Before that, I was a postdoc at the Research Group Applied Functional Analysis, Institute of Mathematics, Technische Universität Berlin. I did my Ph.D. in applied mathematics at Tel-Aviv University, under the supervision of Prof. Nir Sochen.Research InterestsMy research interests are in the areas of mathematics of deep learning, graph deep learning, explainability in deep learning, application areas of deep learning like wireless communication, applied harmonic analysis, time-frequency and wavelet analysis, and randomized algorithms.Contanct InformationE-mail: levieron@technion.ac.il Address: Mathematics DepartmentTechnion - Israel Institute of TechnologyHaifa, 32000Israel Google SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
